   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(openssl_renegotiate_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Callback functions
   27: -export([all/0,
   28:          groups/0,
   29:          init_per_suite/1,
   30:          end_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2,
   34:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   35: 
   36: %% Testcases
   37: -export([erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate/0,
   38:          erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate/1,
   39:          erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate_after_client_data/0,
   40:          erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate_after_client_data/1,
   41:          erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum/0,
   42:          erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum/1,
   43:          erlang_server_openssl_client_nowrap_seqnum/0,
   44:          erlang_server_openssl_client_nowrap_seqnum/1
   45:         ]).
   46: 
   47: %% Apply export
   48: -export([delayed_send/2,
   49:          send_wait_send/2
   50:          ]).
   51: 
   52: -define(SLEEP, 1000).
   53: -define(OPENSSL_RENEGOTIATE, "R\n").
   54: -define(DEFAULT_TIMEOUT, {seconds, 30}).
   55: 
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   58: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   59: 
   60: all() -> 
   61:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   62:         true ->
   63:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   64:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   65:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
   66:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   67:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
   68:         false ->
   69:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   70:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   71:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
   72:              ]
   73:     end.
   74: 
   75: groups() ->
   76:      case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   77:          true ->
   78:              [{'tlsv1.2', [], all_versions_tests()},
   79:               {'tlsv1.1', [], all_versions_tests()},
   80:               {'tlsv1', [], all_versions_tests()},
   81:               {'dtlsv1.2', [], all_versions_tests()},
   82:               {'dtlsv1', [], all_versions_tests()}
   83:              ];
   84:         false ->
   85:              [{'tlsv1.2', [], all_versions_tests()},
   86:               {'tlsv1.1', [], all_versions_tests()},
   87:               {'tlsv1', [], all_versions_tests()}
   88:            ]
   89:      end.
   90:  
   91: all_versions_tests() ->
   92:     [    
   93:      erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate,
   94:      erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate_after_client_data,
   95:      erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum,
   96:      erlang_server_openssl_client_nowrap_seqnum
   97:     ].
   98: 
   99: 
  100: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  101:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
  102:     ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config).
  103: 
  104: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  105:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  106: 
  107: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version(GroupName, Config) of
  109:         true ->
  110:             case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_renegotiate(Config, GroupName) of
  111:                 {skip,_} = Skip ->
  112:                     Skip;
  113:                 _ ->
  114:                     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config)
  115:             end;
  116:         false  ->
  117:             {skip, {atom_to_list(GroupName) ++ " not supported by OpenSSL"}}
  118:     end.
  119: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  120:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  121: 
  122: init_per_testcase(erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum, Config) ->
  123:     ct:timetrap(?DEFAULT_TIMEOUT),
  124:     ssl_test_lib:openssl_allows_client_renegotiate(Config);
  125: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  126:     ct:timetrap(?DEFAULT_TIMEOUT),
  127:     Config.
  128: 
  129: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  130:     Config.
  131: 
  132: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  133: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: 
  136: erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate() ->
  137:     [{doc,"Test erlang client when openssl server issuses a renegotiate"}].
  138: erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  140:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  141: 
  142:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  143:     
  144:     ErlData = "From erlang to openssl",
  145:     OpenSslData = "From openssl to erlang",
  146: 
  147:     {Server, OpenSSLPort} = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [return_port], 
  148:                                                       [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  149:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  150: 
  151:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  152:                                         {host, Hostname},
  153:                                         {from, self()},
  154:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE,
  155:                                                delayed_send, [[ErlData, OpenSslData]]}},
  156:                                          {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
  157: 
  158:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, ?OPENSSL_RENEGOTIATE),
  159:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  160:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, OpenSslData),
  161:     
  162:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, OpenSslData), 
  163:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  164: 
  165: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  166: erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate_after_client_data() ->
  167:     [{doc,"Test erlang client when openssl server issuses a renegotiate after reading client data"}].
  168: erlang_client_openssl_server_renegotiate_after_client_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  169:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  170:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  171: 
  172:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  173: 
  174:     ErlData = "From erlang to openssl",
  175:     OpenSslData = "From openssl to erlang",
  176: 
  177:     {Server, OpenSSLPort} = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [return_port], 
  178:                                                       [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  179:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  180: 
  181:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  182:                                         {host, Hostname},
  183:                                         {from, self()},
  184:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE,
  185:                                                send_wait_send, [[ErlData, OpenSslData]]}},
  186:                                         {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} |ClientOpts]}]),
  187: 
  188:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, ?OPENSSL_RENEGOTIATE),
  189:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  190:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, OpenSslData),
  191: 
  192:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, OpenSslData),
  193:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  194: 
  195: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  196: erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum() ->
  197:     [{doc, "Test that erlang client will renegotiate session when",
  198:       "max sequence number celing is about to be reached. Although"
  199:       "in the testcase we use the test option renegotiate_at"
  200:       " to lower treashold substantially."}].
  201: erlang_client_openssl_server_nowrap_seqnum(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  202:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  203:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  204: 
  205:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  206: 
  207:     ErlData = "From erlang to openssl\n",
  208:     N = 10,
  209: 
  210:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [], 
  211:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  212:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),    
  213:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  214:                                         {host, Hostname},
  215:                                         {from, self()},
  216:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  217:                                                trigger_renegotiate, [[ErlData, N+2]]}},
  218:                                         {options, [{reuse_sessions, false},
  219:                                                    {renegotiate_at, N} | ClientOpts]}]),
  220: 
  221:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok), 
  222:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  223: 
  224: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  225: erlang_server_openssl_client_nowrap_seqnum() ->
  226:     [{doc, "Test that erlang server will renegotiate session when",
  227:       "max sequence number celing is about to be reached. Although"
  228:       "in the testcase we use the test option renegotiate_at"
  229:       " to lower treashold substantially."}].
  230: erlang_server_openssl_client_nowrap_seqnum(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  231:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  232:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  233:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  234: 
  235:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  236: 
  237:     Data = "From openssl to erlang",
  238: 
  239:     N = 10,
  240: 
  241:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  242:                                         {from, self()},
  243:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  244:                                                trigger_renegotiate, [[Data, N+2]]}},
  245:                                         {options, [{renegotiate_at, N}, {reuse_sessions, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  246:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  247: 
  248:     {_Client, OpenSSLPort} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port}, 
  249:                                                                  {options, ClientOpts}, 
  250:                                                                  return_port], Config),
  251:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, Data),
  252: 
  253:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
  254:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  255: 
  256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  257: %% Callbacks
  258: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  259: delayed_send(Socket, [ErlData, OpenSslData]) ->
  260:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  261:     ssl:send(Socket, ErlData),
  262:     ssl_test_lib:active_recv(Socket, length(OpenSslData)).
  263: 
  264: 
  265: send_wait_send(Socket, [ErlData, OpenSslData]) ->
  266:     ssl:send(Socket, ErlData),
  267:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  268:     ssl:send(Socket, ErlData),
  269:     ssl_test_lib:active_recv(Socket, length(OpenSslData)).
  270:
